mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO userNo, M.MEMBER_ID userId, M.PASSWORD userPwd, M.NICKNAME nickName, M.AGE age, M.PHONE phone, M.ADDRESS address, M.INFO info, M.SKILL skill, M.POSITION position, M.SUB_POSITION subPosition, M.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, M.UPDATE_DATE updateDate, NVL(M.TEAM_NO, 0) teamNo, T.MEMBER_TYPE memberType FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN (SELECT TEAM_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_TYPE FROM TEAM_MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y') T ON(M.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{userId} AND M.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS, INFO, SKILL, POSITION, SUB_POSITION ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{nickName}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{info}, #{skill}, #{position}, #{subPosition} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, AGE = #{age}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, INFO=#{info}, SKILL=#{skill}, POSITION=#{position}, SUB_POSITION=#{subPosition}, TEAM_NO=#{teamNo}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
